title: Hint
text: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ considering thrust, air resistance, and the rocket's mass to find the acceleration.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the net force acting on the rocket. Step 2: Calculate the acceleration using the net force and the rocket's mass. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
